```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
ghgs <- read_excel("../GHG_MEGA_GC_SHEET_EXCEL_2020 (1) (3).xlsx", sheet = 2, skip = 6)

colnames(ghgs)[1:4] <- c("Date","Depth_m","Res","Rep")
colnames(ghgs)[13:14] <- c("ch4_umolL","co2_umolL")

ghgs%>%
  filter(Res == "FCR")%>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Date, y = co2_umolL, color = Depth_m))+
  geom_point()
```
